GlossaryTerm.TermName: stage 0 medullary thyroid carcinoma in situ

TermDefinition.DefinitionText: No tumor is found in the thyroid but abnormal cells are found by screening tests. These abnormal cells may become cancer and spread into nearby normal tissue.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "stage 0 medullary thyroid carcinoma in situ"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "carcinoma de tiroides medular in situ, estadio 0"

GlossaryTerm.SpanishTermName: carcinoma de tiroides medular in situ, estadio 0

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: No hay ningún tumor en la tiroides, pero se encuentran células anormales mediante pruebas de diagnóstico. Estas células anormales se pueden volver cancerosas y diseminarse hasta el tejido normal cercano.
